subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jeff Novitzky, who has led a five-and-a-half-year investigation into steroids in professional sports, is expected to attend a hearing on Wednesday at which Roger Clemens is expected to testify.
snippet: Jeff Novitzky, who has led a five-and-a-half-year investigation into steroids in professional sports, is expected to attend a hearing on Wednesday at which Roger Clemens is expected to testify.
